_music

Pluie

Pluie

An alternative rock band formed in 2022 by Gonzalo Chun and Oliver Lee, later joined by Byron Hansen and myself. I currently play bass for Pluie and help with mixing and recording.

Spotify Apple Music Instagram

Kufis

Kufis

A solo project focused acoustic-electronic sounds inspired by the likes of Mid-Air Theif and Sweet Trip. My best ever work as of writing this, performed, recorded, and mixed by myself.

Spotify Apple Music Instagram

Honey - Elevator Talk

Honey - Elevator Talk

A track I worked on with the bedroom pop group elevator talk. This was the group's debut track which now has over half a million streams on spotify. I did all the instrumentation for this track and helped with production.

Spotify Apple Music YouTube

Silfobeats

Silfobeats

Originially my soundcloud page for posting lofi hip hop beats I would make during my early years of music making, it is now the home to all sorts of random throw-away tracks which would never be online otherwise. Silfobeats has over 100,000 streams over all.
